meaningMnemonic: In <radical>spirit</radical> <radical>valley</radical>, spirits are <kanji>abundant</kanji>. Hence the name. Spirit valley has over two billion spirits floating in it.
readingMnemonic: In spirit valley, it's not just spirits that are <kanji>abundant</kanji>. There is an abundance of <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう) as well.
